name: project: sonic turbo
description:
A sonic fan game that tries to be a bit different than the ussual sonic fan game.

Including new locations and new designs for the characters.

Controls:

-Keyboard: move, jump & double jump

-Down & space bar (on floor) : thunder peel out

-Down & space bar (on air): stomp

-space bar: homing attack

other:

-1 & 2 keys: change test level

-R key: reset level
